text: Hélio Freitas (born 23 October 1969) is a Brazilian cross-country skier. He competed in the men's 15 kilometre classical event at the 2006 Winter Olympics. ==References== Category:1969 births Category:Living people Category:Brazilian male cross-country skiers Category:Olympic cross-country skiers of Brazil Category:Cross-country skiers at the 2006 Winter Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Porto Alegre
title: Hélio Freitas
